Ino twirls a bundle of moon flowers into the air which transforms into a circular blade, somewhat resembling a chakram. She then throws the blade at the opponent, slashing anything in its way. Once it gets to the opponent, it slashes through them and explodes into moon flower petals.

== Trivia ==
* {{translation|Ichirin|一輪}} is a counter for both flowers and wheels.
